general_advidory: As per IMD forecast, the Dhenkanal district is likely to have clear to cloudy weather with light rainfall and wind speed between 6-8 km/h. The maximum temperature is likely to remain between 27-28Â°C and the maximum relative humidity will be 76% for the next five days.

PADDY.advisory: Farmers should apply 35 kg Urea per acre at 3 weeks after transplanting at active tillering stage for high-yielding paddy varieties. To control stem borer in paddy, apply 8kg/acre of Fipronil 0.3% GR or Imidacloprid 0.3% GR by mixing with sand at a 1:1 ratio.

SUGARCANE.advisory: Carry out planting of Sugarcane crop. To control sett rot disease after planting, carry out basal drenching with Carbendazim 12% + Mancozeb 63% @ 400 grams/acre or foliar spray with Metalaxyl 8% + Mancozeb 64% WP @ 400 grams/acre by mixing in 200 liters of water.

BLACK GRAM & GREEN GRAM.advisory: To control Bihar hairy caterpillar in green gram and black gram crop, spray Chlorpyriphos 50% + Cypermethrin 5% E.C @ 400 ml/acre by mixing it in 200 liters of water.

GROUNDNUT.advisory: To manage the carrier of Bud necrosis disease (Thrips) during the primary stage of pest infestation, spray Neem-Based Pesticide (Azadirachtin) 1500 PPM @ 600 ml/acre. To manage Thrips chemically, spray Thiamethoxam 25% W.G @ 40 grams/acre or Acetamiprid 20% S.P. @ 50 grams/acre or Imidacloprid 17.8% SL @ 60-ml/acre by mixing in 200 liters of water.

BRINJAL.advisory: To manage little leaf disease of Brinjal transmitted by leaf hopper, spray Thiamethoxam 25 % WG @ 50 g/acre or Flonicamid 50% WG @ 60 g/acre.

POTATO.advisory: To control cutworm in potato crop, spray Chlorpyriphos 50% + Cypermethrin 5 % E.C @ 400 ml/acre by mixing in 200 liters of water.

ONION.advisory: To manage purple blotch and Stemphylium leaf blight disease in onion, spray Mancozeb 75% WP @ 600 grams/acre or Difenoconazole 25% E.C @ 200ml/acre or Tebuconazole 25.9% E.C @ 100ml/acre by mixing in 200 liters of water at 15 days interval.

MANGO.advisory: To manage mango hoppers, spray Imidacloprid 17.8% SL @ 5ml/15 liters of water or Thiamethoxam 25% W.G @ 3ml/15 liters of water or Acetamiprid 20% S.P. @ 4g/15 liters of water.
